Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't use Canva for a while (since November 2020).

I would like to refund all of my money back.

and please unsubscribe my Canva pro too.

Thank you

Refund request reason: I only signed up for the free trial and came back later to unsubscribe but I still got billed. I'd like to receive a refund as I don't plan on using the service.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I had cancelled after the free trial.  I went through all of the steps to unsubscribe on the website. However, I was charged for the full year payment subscription today anyway.  I would like my money refunded and stop using the Pro version.

Refund request reason: I had unsubscribed from the Canvas Pro plan but it automatically set back to the plan. I cannot afford this service and request a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My subscription was autorenewed after trial on Jan <NUMBER>. I have unsubscribed to the pro account and I do not need this anymore. Please refund the amount.

Not sure what has gone wrong as I am positive I hit unsubscribe. Could you kindly refund the amount I was billed please.

What did you have a problem with?: Premium templates

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Dear Canva team. I only used Canva once and I was not satisfied. I unsubscribe. But today I saw that I was charged. Please refund my money back it is my tution fee account. I do not use this program. Please refund and unsubscribe for all. Thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I unsubscribe before trial ended and was still billed. Please refund and unsubscribe. Please confirm.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up just to check out the website for one night .. I didn’t know how to unsubscribe for me to not get charged.. I would like my refund of $16.99 please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi 
I got the Canva free trial to check if it is suitable for my purpose, unfortunately it didn't work and forgot to unsubscribe it.  It would be appreciated if you refund $17.99.

<NAME>

Invoice #: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Today, January 9th, right now, a monthly subscription to Canva pro was mistakenly selected. I request that you unsubscribe and give me the money back, please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hey, I thought i have unsubscribed and cancelled my plan with canva and I was really upset and frustrated to find out that you have taken money out of my account If I could respectfully get a refund that would be great, Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I do not mean to subscribe. I plan to use the free trial and then I will unsubscribe but I do not know why there is a charge even though I have unsubscribe. Please refund to me or I will consider a lawsuit.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I have unsubscribed and am not using it. Give me back my money.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I want the subscription refund since I unsubscribed Canvas pro when the email arrived on the 7th that it was going to be renewed and I don't use it enough to pay for a subscription so expensive. I would appreciate a refund of the amount. Thank you.

Számla száma: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I subscribed to canva, I used it only one time, in December, but I forgot to unsubscribe. Can you please help me refund this amount? Thank you for your help!

Refund request reason: i already delete my account and unsubscribe it pls refund my money back i need it

Refund request reason: I want to unsubscribe my plan and please refund my money

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Describe your issue: I want to unsubscribe my Canva Pro plan and also refund my money

Nr faktury: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi,
Due to covid-19, I was forced to stop the company's operations. I am asking for a refund for my annual subscription. Please unsubscribe.
Thank you!

No. faktur: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Dear Sir or Madam, 

I was using the Canva Pro trial and I have not known how to unsubscribe my account for the days after trial and it says  automatically subscribed until next month. Could you please guide me to unsubscribe and I would like to request for refund  for this first month, since I have not used it again and would not use the account in the near time. 

Thank you very much for your time and assistance. I wish you a nice day and stay healthy.

Best regards
Gianiti Claresta
Invoice #: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hi, I have subscribed to Canva pro by mistake, but immediately unsubscribed, but I want to request a refund of the € 11.99 charged, thank you .
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I did not manage to unsubscribe and I will not continue because I will not use it enough and I cannot afford to pay it, please request a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I unsubscribed from canva before the renewel and it went through and logged me out but they charged me anyway for it

How can we help you ?: hello my card appears loaded, I think I informed it thinking that they would not make a charge until I authorize it, please request to unsubscribe and make a refund of the amount charged, thank you.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I have never used it after payment. The subscription cancellation method was not provided in detail, so the cancellation period was missed and automatic payment was made. Just unsubscribe! Please be sure to refund. Thank you. Have a good day!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have tried multiple months in a row to delete my canva subscription. Last month after I saw I got charged again $16.99 when I thought I had already unsubscribed, I went back in and disconnected my account and unsubscribed again. Today (February 4) I noticed I was again charged $16.99. I no longer want my canna account and would like to be refunded for the months that I have not used the website and I thought I has unsubscribed. Please contact me at <EMAIL>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Cannot afford subscription and meant to unsubscribe. Please refund. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't remember when I accept subscription request , I hardly use Canva .I tried one or two times just to see how it works Now I am not using Canva . Please refund and unsubscribe my subscription
Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for refund request: Hello, I would like to stop my subscription, this is the second time I am writing to you, can you unsubscribe please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello. I was billed for Canva premium. I did not get an email to unsubscribe and I thought I was already unsubscribed. I always unsubscribe when offered Canva trials -- I cannot afford this charge at this time. I haven't even used Canva in weeks! Could I please have a refund of my $12.95? I have made sure to unsubscribe from Pro. Thank you. ~Rachel

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I accidentally not unsubscribe after the trial period and Canva charged me 119 dollars for 1 year Pro subscription. I'm hereby requesting a refund. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, 

I’m sure I unsubscribed well within the trial period - the product wasn’t exactly what I needed and I saw it in one or two times using it and unsubscribed. 
I just realized that I was charged for two month already. I’d like a refund for both months if possible.

Thanks!
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I want the refund, I unsubscribed a few days ago.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I got confused when making the subscription. I even mistook the bank card, the payment has reached my sister. I have already unsubscribed. Please request a refund on your account. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I trialled canva pro but forgot to unsubscribe from plan as I don’t need it at this stage. Please refund and cancel my subscription.

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: I subscribed this service by accident and I couldnt find the unsubscribe it. Kindly unsubscribe it and help me get a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

But I do not want to make the subscription. May I know if I can unsubscribe now and get a 11 moth refund? thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my Canva Pro account because I was unsatisfied and it was very expensive for me. However, on Jan 10, I got a warning email saying that I would be charged $17. I was confused as I already cancelled it, but went in again to make sure. In my account it showed still subscribed, so I assumed there may have been an error with the website the first time I unsubscribed. So, I unsubscribed again on Jan 10, but I received an email today about my invoice?! Very confused, as I made sure to cancel it. It has only been 30 minutes since you started charging me, so I assume this can be easily refunded, as it is no error of mine. Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, I've received a notification from Paypal this morning telling me that my Canva payment has been authorised. I forgot to unsubscribe before the payment. I'd like to know if it is possible to unsubscribe and get a refund. Sorry for the inconvenience. I'm a student and unfortunately, I cannot afford it even if I'd love to. Cheers, <NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Sorry I forgot to unsubscribe before the renewal date and unfortunately I cannot afford to pay the annual amoutnt right now. I wish I could. If I could please have a refund that would be much appreciated.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good evening I unsubscribed from canva Pro on January 16th but was charged € 107.88. I am requesting a refund. Thanks <NAME>

Refund request reason: I MEANT TO UNSUBSCRIBE! I have not been using canva's pro/trial features at all recently. i do not want it! please reverse the charge, i cannot afford this at all! please understand, thanks

Refund request reason: I had unsubscribed canva last week, but I was charged again today. When I logged in from my laptop I had to unsubscribe from the existing plan and also removed my credit card. I request a refund due to the technical glitch.

Refund request reason: i received that you have cancelled my subscription. after  free membership period i started paying monthly. and i never unsubscribe.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

I went ahead with it and I am certain the un-subscription went through. However, that same day later at night, seems like I still got charged for the renewal! I never wanted to renew and I am positive I unsubscribed, this charge was not called for so please kindly resolve the issue and refund it. Thank you greatly.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I unsubscribed the pro subscription before the due date i.e. 10th january. still the amount is deducted. kindly refund my amount

I would like to know what the problem is, Thank you very much!

Refund request reason: It’s my fault but I didn’t unsubscribe before it auto renewed. Any way to reverse this?
